full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DRAG PO LCOG BRDUNG BYA TSUL DGRA BGEGS BRLAG BYED RDO RJE'I THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033B (CES GRAG PO LCOG BRDUNG GI TSUL DGRA BGEGS BRLAG BYED PA'I RDO RJE'I @034A *, ,THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GSHED 'DUL DRAG PO LCOG BRDUNG GI CHO GA GZHIR RTEN , THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I SHIN TU GSANG BA'I GTER KHA LAS KYANG KHA SBYOR DBYE BA SOGS SNAN PA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG LEN GYIS BRGYAN TE, ,CHAGS MDO THANG BA RIG 'DZIN MI BSKYOD RIGS KYI RDO RJE'I BU DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BGYIS PA, ,'DIS KYANG GZHAN DON GRUB PA'I RGYU RU GYUR CING, DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,LEGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
